So Michelle and her boyfriend were here this week.  It was so good to see her!  I haven't seen her in over a year, and I probably won't see her until close to Gina's wedding in two years.  But it was a fun week.

Sunday, I had to work until 6.  Gina, Michelle, and Reinier met me at work.  We met up with Gina's brother and his girlfriend, and the 6 of us went into the North End for dinner.  We had dinner, and walked around for awhile.  LOL Reinier has never been to New Englad before, so he was taking pictures of EVERYTHING!  It was amusing.

Monday, we went to Canobie Lake Park.  It was me, my brother, Gina, Matt, Michelle, Reinier, Matt's sister, Brian, and Tom. It was a fun day, as Canobie always is (LOL Bridgette).  I think the most amusing thing was watching Ryan and Brian chugging beers.  And all of Ryan's voice notes LMAO.  

Wednesday I went into Boston with Gina, Matt, Michelle, and Reinier.  (Yes, I felt like the 5th wheel, which was so kindly pointed out to me when the comment was made that I was "the only girl there without a man."  Thanks bunches.  But thank God for Reinier, who was the only one who seemed to notice how uncomfortable parts of the day were for me.)  Anyhow, the 5 of us did the Duck Tours.  LOL I felt like such a tourist in my own city!  But it was fun.  After the Duck Tour, we hung around the commons and walked around.  (Pictures to come next week when I get them developed.)  Reinier was so funny!  He has never seen squirrels or pigeons before, so every time he saw them, he would chase after them and take pictures.  It made for an amusing afternoon.

Friday, the 4 of them went whale watching.  I had to work, so I couldn't go.  While I would have loved to have had one last day with Michelle and Reinier, I was kind of glad that I couldn't go.  It's kind of awkward hanging out with your 2 friends and their boyfriends.  Especially after the comment that was made on Wednesday.  Anyhow, they did come by Marshalls to day goodbye cuz they left today.  I'm gonna miss my Michelle!  But at least I got to see her, and it was a fun week.

OK, I'm out.  I'm friggin exhausted and I have the pleasure of working all day tomorrow.

--Megs

What could possibly possess someone to take their own life?  What could be so bad that ending your life seems like the only way to deal with it?  I just don't get it, maybe because I don't think that way.  Getting a call from your best friend saying that an old high school classmate has done just that kinda of makes you think.  I've barely spoken more than 2 words to him since the end of my junior year of high school (since the day he and Adam went too far and actually made me cry) but it still affects me.  And it affects my friends, and that kills me.  I keep thinking about how he used to tease me every single day in English class.  He was friends with my brother, so my brother told him to make fun of me (cuz at the time, my brother didn't like my boyfriend).  So every day, he would tease me.  And then at lunch, he and my brother sat behind me and would tease me every day.  But it was all in fun, ya know?  It made me laugh.  

His death was such a shock, and I still can't believe it happened.  Hopefully I'll remember him as the kid who used to make me laugh, and not as the kid who took the "easy way out."

My thoughts and prayers to your family, and all the friends who will miss you.

I'm so tired, but it's too early for me to go to bed.  Plus, I took a nap a little while ago, so I'm not really sleepy, just tired.  I'm supposed to have the day off tomorrow, but Dawn asked me today if I would be willing to work 5-close tomorrow night.  Sure, why not?  If you count working at the dentist office, I haven't had a day off since last Tuesday, and now I won't have one off til Friday.  But I got Friday and Saturday night off, so it's all good.

Yesterday I pushed my car and made it take me to Maine.  LOL.  My poor little Chiquita broke down on me last Monday and then I drove her to Maine last night.  I'm surprised she didn't blow up on me then and there.

So yeah, I went to Maine last night to see Gary and Jamie.  It was fun.  I was all proud of myself for not getting lost!  Anyhow, at 9:00 last night, I got a phone call saying I should go up there.  I was kinda iffy about it, cuz I didn't think my parents would go for me driving up there by myself at that time of night, and because I had to work at 10 AM today.  But, I was guilt-tripped into it (lol just kidding Gary ;)  ).  I got there at about 11:30ish.  We drank and talked for awhile, and eventually went to bed.  It was after 3 AM by the time I fell asleep, and then my alarm on my cell went off at 5:30 AM.  I had to make sure I had enough time to get home and get ready for work.  I ended up getting home a little after 8 this morning.  So I took a quick nap before work.  LOL who takes a nap at 8 in the morning?

So then I spent the entire day at work trying to figure out what was wrong with me, cuz something just didn't feel right.  It was too quiet in my area, so I got to do a lot of thinking.  I realized some things that I didn't want to realize and now I'm pissed at myself.

And that brings us to now.  And now I'm out cuz my sister just called to ask me something, and apparently she is gonna be home in a few minutes, and then we have to chat.

Lata kiddies!
